net.geohhot.jsonLoader

Class JSONLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.geohhot.jsonLoader.JSONLoader

  • public class JSONLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    JSONLoader - helper library for loading JSON files as config files making changes, and saving them
    See Also:
    JSONObject

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JSONLoader()
      Just initializes JSONLoader without any configuration
      JSONLoader(java.lang.String configFileName)
      Makes JSONLoader ready for .loadFile
      JSONLoader(java.lang.String configFileName, org.json.JSONObject defaultConfig)
      Makes JSONLoader ready for .loadFile with default configuration, if file is not found, it will create one

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File getConfigFile()
      Returns configuration File
      java.lang.String getConfigFileName()
      Returns configuration file name
      org.json.JSONObject getRoot()
      Return root object of JSON configuration file
      void loadFile()
      Loads file and makes ready for reading/changing
      void loadFile(java.lang.String fileName)
      Load selected file
      void loadFile(java.lang.String fileName, org.json.JSONObject defaultConfigFile)
      Load selected file with selected default configuration
      void saveFile()
      Saves modified file
      void setRoot(org.json.JSONObject newRoot)
      Sets new root with modified info

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
